excerpt: "ViewSonic Corp., a leading global provider of visual solutions, launches Android™ Enterprise Devices Licensing Agreement [EDLA]-certified ViewBoard® interactive displays with the IFP52 ED series. The ViewBoard® IFP52 ED series of displays provides education users with a powerful productivity and collaboration tool."
